# Qtile dotfiles

## Dependencies:
- Qtile (obviously)
  + Qtile layout icons extra (already included in this repo)
- Qtile-extras
  
- Nitrogen
  - Archlinux-wallpaper
    
- Zsh
  - Oh my Zsh

- NeoVim
  - NeoVim Pluggins

- Alacritty
  
- Rofi
  
- Scrot
